privacy.showLocationDesc: Turning off will hide your location from others
privacy.showActiveDesc: Turning off will hide activity from others
privacy.showNearbyDesc: Turning off will make it impossible for nearby people to search for you
privacy.profileProtectionDesc: Enable to protect your profile from being copied
privacy.pipDesc: Enable to use the viewer in Picture-in-Picture mode

zoom.description: Zoom affects the entire app, including text, buttons, and images. Use it to improve readability or viewing.

copyright.title: Copyright Information
copyright.section1p1: Â© 2024 LiveGo. All rights reserved. The content, layout, design, data, databases and graphics on this application are protected by intellectual property laws and are owned by LiveGo, unless otherwise stated.
copyright.section2p1: All trademarks, service marks, and trade names are proprietary to LiveGo or other respective owners that have granted LiveGo the right and license to use such marks.
copyright.section3p1: You are solely responsible for the content you broadcast or display ('post') on the LiveGo service. You must not post content that infringes upon the intellectual property rights of others. We will remove infringing content if we are properly notified.
copyright.section4p1: If you believe that your copyrighted work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement and is accessible via the service, please notify our copyright agent.
copyright.section4p2: Please send all infringement notices to:

earnings.title: Earnings Information
earnings.conversionBody: The conversion of your accumulated 'Earnings' on the platform to Brazilian Reais (BRL) is completely free. There are no hidden fees in this process. Your Earnings balance is converted using the platform's current exchange rate.
earnings.feeBody: When you request a withdrawal, a service fee is applied to cover operational and payment processing costs. The split is transparent:
earnings.streamerShareBody: The majority of the value is yours! We believe in rewarding our content creators.
earnings.platformShareBody: This fee helps us keep the platform secure, develop new features, and support the community.

store.exclusiveBody: This is an exclusive store for VIP members with special room effects.

endStream.endBattleBody: Are you sure you want to leave the PK battle?
endStream.endStreamBody: Are you sure you want to end the stream? This action cannot be undone.

chat.becameFriends: You are now friends! Tap to view.

liveManual.title: Live Stream Manual
liveManual.section1p1: Cover and Title: Choose a clear cover image and an attention-grabbing title. This is the first thing viewers will see!
liveManual.section1p2: Category: Select the correct category (Music, Dance, Games, etc.) so your target audience can find your live stream more easily.
liveManual.section1p3: Quality: Check your internet connection. Good lighting and clear audio are essential to keep viewers engaged.
liveManual.section2p1: Interact with the Chat: Talk to your viewers! Answer questions, thank them for gifts, and make them feel part of the stream.
liveManual.section2p2: Co-host and PK Tools: Invite friends to join your live stream or start a PK Battle to make things more exciting. Use the tools in the options menu.
liveManual.section2p3: Beauty Effects: Use filters and beauty effects to improve your image quality and have fun.
liveManual.section3p1: WebRTC (Default): The simplest way to start streaming, directly from your browser, with no additional software needed.
liveManual.section3p2: RTMP/SRT: For advanced streamers using software like OBS Studio. Copy the server URL and stream key to your program for more control over the quality and layout of your live stream.
liveManual.section4p1: Be Consistent: Try to stream at regular times so your fans know when to find you.
liveManual.section4p2: Promote: Let your followers on other social networks know you're going live.
liveManual.section4p3: Community Rules: Remember to follow the platform's guidelines to maintain a safe and fun environment for everyone.

resolution.title: Video Quality
resolution.description: Adjusting the quality may affect data usage and stream smoothness.
